## HeaderContentRendererAbstractComponent.orderBy() method

Applies ordering for specified column

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
orderBy(meta: BasicOrderableColumn<TData>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  meta | <code>BasicOrderableColumn&lt;TData&gt;</code> | Metadata for column that was selected for ordering |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
